original_text: He put soldiers in all Judah's cities that had walls around them and in other places in Judah. He also put soldiers in the towns of Ephraim that his father Asa had taken power over. Chronicles 16 Chronicles 18
korean_text: 유다 모든 견고한 성읍에 군대를 주둔시키고 또 유다 땅과 그의 아버지 아사가 정복한 에브라임 성읍들에 영문을 두었더라

sentences.original_text: He put soldiers in all Judah's cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유다의 모든 도시에 군사를 배치했습니다

sentences.original_text: and in other places in Judah
He also put soldiers in the towns of Ephraim
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 에브라임의 여러 성읍에 군사를 배치했습니다

sentences.original_text: that his father Asa had taken power over
